Introduction
This topic contains information on congenital or developmental defects and refractive errors of the eyes, including
excluding congenital or developmental defects
definition of refractive errors
refractive errors
amblyopia
, and
establishing SC for unusual developments
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section A - Conditions of the Eyes
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section A
